title: Kiekaketa Monogataritachi no Tame ni
original_name: 消えかけた物語たちの為に
sinopse: A somewhat dark and surreal tale by Naoyuki Tsuji. Our protagonist sets out on a journey in a world which starts at The Gate of Confusion. To complete his travels, he must meet various strange characters to relieve himself of his burdens and set himself free.
